text: Aap kahiye kay jo kuch aasmano aur zamin mein mojood hai yeh sab kiss ki milkiyat hai aap keh dijiye kay sab Allah hi ki milkiyat hai Allah ney meharbani farmana apney upper laazim farma liya hai tum ko Allah qayamat kay roz jama keray ga iss mein koi shak nahi jin logon ney apney aap ko ghatay mein daala hai so woh eman nahi layen gay
